articles.title: SBI Life Insurance appoints Amit Jhingran as new CEO - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Amit Jhingran joined State Bank of India as a Probationary Officer in August 1991. In a career spanning over 30 years with SBI, he has held various assignments across International Banking, Retail Banking and Branch Management.
articles.content:
SBI Life Insurance Company on September 28 said its Board has appointed a new Managing Director & CEO after the current one is being transferred to take position in parent State Bank of India.
